00028 #ifndef MYSQLPP_FIELD_TYPES_H
00029 #define MYSQLPP_FIELD_TYPES_H
00030 
00031 #include "type_info.h"
00032 
00033 #include <vector>
00034 
00035 namespace mysqlpp {
00036 
00037 #if !defined(DOXYGEN_IGNORE)
00038 // Make Doxygen ignore this
00039 class MYSQLPP_EXPORT ResultBase;
00040 #endif
00041 
00043 class FieldTypes : public std::vector<mysql_type_info>
00044 {
00045 public:
00047         FieldTypes() { }
00048         
00050         FieldTypes(const ResultBase* res)
00051         {
00052                 init(res);
00053         }
00054 
00056         FieldTypes(int i) :
00057         std::vector<mysql_type_info>(i)
00058         {
00059         }
00060 
00062         FieldTypes& operator =(const ResultBase* res)
00063         {
00064                 init(res);
00065                 return *this;
00066         }
00067 
00072         FieldTypes& operator =(int i)
00073         {
00074                 insert(begin(), i, mysql_type_info());
00075                 return *this;
00076         }
00077 
00078 private:
00079         void init(const ResultBase* res);
00080 };
00081 
00082 } // end namespace mysqlpp
00083 
00084 #endif
